# llms-txt-ruby

> Ruby implementation of the llms.txt specification for LLM-friendly content

## Documentation

- [API Documentation](https://rubydoc.info/gems/my_awesome_gem)
- [Getting Started Guide](https://llms-txt-ruby.io/docs/getting_started.md)
- [Configuration Guide](https://llms-txt-ruby.io/docs/configuration.md)
- [Contributing Guidelines](https://llms-txt-ruby.io/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [API Documentation](https://github.com/mensfeld/llms-txt-ruby): Complete API reference
- [Getting Started with llms-txt-ruby](wiki/getting-started.md): Beginner guide (1 min)

## Examples

- [Basic usage example for llms-txt-ruby](examples/basic_usage.rb): !/usr/bin/env ruby frozen_string_literal: true Basic usage example for llms-txt-ruby This example shows how to generate an llms.txt file using the Ruby API
- [Example of custom configuration for llms-txt-ruby](examples/custom_config.rb): !/usr/bin/env ruby frozen_string_literal: true Example of custom configuration for llms-txt-ruby Shows advanced configuration options
- [DSL usage examples for llms-txt-ruby](examples/dsl_usage.rb): !/usr/bin/env ruby frozen_string_literal: true DSL usage examples for llms-txt-ruby Shows the new composable DSL for building llms.txt files
- [Wiki processing example for llms-txt-ruby](examples/wiki_processing.rb): !/usr/bin/env ruby frozen_string_literal: true Wiki processing example for llms-txt-ruby Shows how to use the gem with wiki directories and link processing
- [Example of using llms-txt-ruby with Claude AI](examples/with_claude.rb): !/usr/bin/env ruby frozen_string_literal: true Example of using llms-txt-ruby with Claude AI This example requires an Anthropic API key
- [LlmsTxt#configuration Example](#)
- [LlmsTxt#configure Example](#): Configure with Claude AI
- [LlmsTxt#generate Example](#): Generate with AI
